parameters.name: filePath
parameters.description: File path to download within the data-link (e.g., `folder/subfolder/object`).

parameters.name: credentialsId
parameters.description: Credentials string identifier. Required for generating download URLs for private data-links.

parameters.name: preview
parameters.description: If `true`, generates a URL for preview purposes. If `false`, generates a URL for direct download. Default: `false`.
